Class Answer

java.lang.Object
database.model.BaseEntity
database.model.entities.Answer
public class Answer extends BaseEntity
Represents an answer to a question in the system.

This class stores the message related to the answer, the associated question ID, and the parent answer ID (if this answer is part of a thread). It also contains a boolean to indicate if the answer is pinned.

Author:
Dhruv

  • Constructor Details

    • Answer

      public Answer()
      Default constructor for Answer. Initializes a new instance of the Answer class without setting any properties.

    • Answer

      public Answer(Message message, Integer questionId, Integer parentAnswerId, boolean isPinned)
      Constructs a new Answer with the specified message, question ID, parent answer ID, and pinned status.
      Parameters:
      message - The message content of the answer.
      questionId - The ID of the question this answer is related to.
      parentAnswerId - The ID of the parent answer if this is a nested reply.
      isPinned - Indicates whether the answer is pinned.

  • Method Details

    • getMessage

      public Message getMessage()
      Gets the message associated with the answer.
      Returns:
      The message content of the answer.

    • setMessage

      public Answer setMessage(Message message)
      Sets the message associated with the answer.
      Parameters:
      message - The new message to be associated with the answer.

    • getQuestionId

      public Integer getQuestionId()
      Gets the ID of the question this answer is related to.
      Returns:
      The question ID associated with this answer.

    • setQuestionId

      public Answer setQuestionId(Integer questionId)
      Sets the ID of the question this answer is related to.
      Parameters:
      questionId - The new question ID to be associated with the answer.

    • getParentAnswerId

      public Integer getParentAnswerId()
      Gets the ID of the parent answer, if this answer is a reply to another.
      Returns:
      The parent answer ID, or null if this is a top-level answer.

    • setParentAnswerId

      public Answer setParentAnswerId(Integer parentAnswerId)
      Sets the ID of the parent answer, if this answer is a reply to another.
      Parameters:
      parentAnswerId - The new parent answer ID to be set.

    • getIsPinned

      public boolean getIsPinned()
      Gets whether the answer is pinned.
      Returns:
      true if the answer is pinned, false otherwise.

    • setPinned

      public Answer setPinned(boolean pinned)
      Sets the pinned status of the answer.
      Parameters:
      pinned - true if the answer should be pinned, false otherwise.
